entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and early this afternoon then 70 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
